executiveSummary: Justin Wang, founder of LARQ, pitched his self-cleaning, water-purifying bottle seeking $500,000 for 1% equity. After discussion about valuation, market opportunity, and charitable commitments, he secured a deal with Kevin O’Leary and Lori Greiner for $1 million in exchange for 4% equity, maintaining his prior company valuation.
keyDecisions: Justin Wang accepted an investment offer from Kevin O’Leary and Lori Greiner for $1 million in exchange for 4% equity.
nextSteps: LARQ will collaborate with Kevin O’Leary and Lori Greiner to scale distribution, explore QVC and other retail channels, and continue developing new purification products like the LARQ pitcher.
